video.title: Dogs with Jobs
video.synopsis: From rescuers to entertainers, this series follows working dogs around the world and explores the intense bond they share with people.

episodes.synopsis: Maggie is a chocolate lab who helps an autistic 7-year-old boy in Alberta, Canada; A.J. is a bloodhound who searches for missing pets in California.
episodes.title: Episode 1: Maggie: Service Dog & A.J. Pet Detective

episodes.synopsis: Bruno, a German shepherd police dog, has saved his partner's life twice; Honey is a cocker spaniel who works with inmates at a women's prison.
episodes.title: Bruno: An American Police Dog & Honey: Companion DogEpisode 2

episodes.synopsis: Sarcelle, a Bernese mountain dog, assists a boy with disabilities in Quebec; Sweep is an English Border collie who herds sheep.
episodes.title: Episode 3: Sarcelle: Seeing Eye Service Dog & Sweep: Sheep dog

episodes.synopsis: Austrian Belgian shepherd Landris works with a counterterrorism squad; a high-jumping Russian wolfhound named Wolf tries to break a world record.
episodes.title: Episode 4: Landris: Cobra Commando & Wolf: Superdog

episodes.synopsis: Famous RCA mascot Nipper helps pay the bills at a unique animal sanctuary; Anatolian shepherd Bellow protects sheep from cheetahs in Namibia.
episodes.title: Episode 5: Bellow: Cheetah Dog & Nipper: Superstar

episodes.synopsis: Greyhound Dee is enjoying his new life after leaving racing behind; Labrador retriever Endal helps a Royal Navy veteran with everyday tasks.
episodes.title: Episode 6: Dee: Greyhound Rescue & Endal: Memory Dog

episodes.synopsis: German shepherd Petro helps locate the bodies of disaster victims; champion standard poodle Mel takes us inside the serious business of dog shows.
episodes.title: Episode 7: Petro: Earthquake Dog & Mel: Top Dog

episodes.synopsis: Golden retriever Willy warns his epileptic mistress when she's going to have a seizure; cattle dog Rope helps manage a 3,500-acre ranch in Alberta.
episodes.title: Episode 8: Willy: Seizure Dog & Rope: Cattle Dog

episodes.synopsis: Labrador Malcolm works in arson investigations in Montreal; yellow lab Corky helps his blind owner reconnect with the world in New York City.
episodes.title: Episode 9: Malcolm: Arson Dog & Corky: Guiding Eyes

episodes.synopsis: A Vietnam veteran remembers Clipper, a brave German shepherd he had to leave behind; Bam-Bam the lab is trained to sniff out bombs in New York City.
episodes.title: Episode 10: Clipper: Vietnam War Dog & Bam Bam: Bomb Dog

episodes.synopsis: Wolf-husky Kavik stars in the TV series "Call of the Wild"; Mas works for the Italian Coast Guard as a rescue dog who jumps from helicopters.
episodes.title: Episode 11: Kavik: Call of the Wild & Mas: Water Rescue Dog

episodes.synopsis: Dani, a beagle who survived cancer, visits young patients in the hospital; German shepherd King has the dangerous job of sniffing out land mines.
episodes.title: Episode 12: Dani: Cancer Dog & King: Mine Detector

episodes.synopsis: Musher Mitch Seavey and his lead dog, Dolphin, tackle a three-day, round-the-clock dogsled race in Northern Minnesota.
episodes.title: Episode 13: Sled Dog

episodes.synopsis: Rescued greyhound Gracie competes to become the face of Greyhound Bus Lines. Klondike the sheep dog and Tiger the Great Pyrenees work with livestock.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Popsicle the pit bull sniffs out drug dealers, terrier puppy Harvey helps out at a seniors' home, and Tattie the border collie patrols a golf course.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Tilly the collie investigates fires in South Africa, golden retriever Murphy is a physical therapist for kids, and puppy Madison tests bakery treats.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: A male Jack Russell mothers orphaned cubs in Africa, a golden retriever learns search and rescue, and a beagle takes a bite out of crime in Montreal.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Ginny helps rescue cats in New York City, Basil tends to a large sheep herd in Australia, and huge Freddie works as a walking billboard in Toronto.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Rowdy the mutt shines as a TV star, Wizard attracts crowds to his owner's restaurant, and Rio the Portuguese Water Dog is a perfect baseball retriever.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Tombre is a special companion who changes lives, Rosa is a Frisbee champion, and Gabe supervises activities at Camp Ruffin' It in British Columbia.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Guide dog MacKenzie and her blind owner have an unbreakable bond, Bear helps train teen lifeguards, and border collies Tess and Blue herd elk.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Weimeraner Fay Wray inspires artist William Wegman, German shepherd Jake rounds up poachers, and Toby sniffs out drugs in California high schools.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Rescue mutt Marty is the star of a canine troupe, Tasha aids an epileptic teenager, and Akita Nana undergoes obedience training to stop bad habits.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Akita Kiyoshi is a double-duty service dog, German shepherd Brix fights crime at Niagara Falls, and spaniel Ellie adopts a family of orphaned bunnies.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Yukon searches for a missing snowboarder, Biggles leads a pack of British bloodhounds, and Kodak puts on a daredevil show in the Wisconsin Dells.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and his teenage trainer lead their team on a difficult sled race, mutt Flip-Flop goes surfing, and Bozo helps his owner, who uses a wheelchair.
episodes.title: Episode 13
